subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text: {{Han char|rn=1|rad=一|as=06|sn=7|four=10227|canj=MBIB|ids=⿱一⿰⿵冂丶⿵冂丶<small>(G)</small>,⿰⿱一⿵冂丶⿱一⿵冂丶<small>(HT)</small>}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
* Depending on the font the top stroke may be broken (+7 strokes) or not (+6 strokes)
* Unicode ever counted it to radical 3 丶 (between [[丼]] and [[举]])
